Class AngleMeter

java.lang.Object
  greenfoot.Actor
      AngleMeter

public class AngleMeter
extends greenfoot.Actor

CircleMeter is a class that builds a "status" meter in a semi-circle. Pressing left or right arrow keys will visually fill/reduce the status YOU PROBABLY SHOULD ***NOT*** MODIFY THIS CODE, although you can if you want to.

Version:
1/2018
Author:
Stephen Blythe

Constructor Summary
AngleMeter(int radius)
          constructs a 180 degree (half circle) meter with specified radius
AngleMeter(int radius, int maxDegree)
          constructs a semicircle meter with specified radius and maximum degree.
 
Method Summary
 void act()
          act - allows AngleMeter to move in response to the left or right arrow keys being pressed.
 double getAngle()
          getAngle specifies (in radians) the current angle value of the meter
 int getArcX()
          getArcX gives the x value of the perimeter of the circle where the meter is currently filled to
 int getArcY()
          getArcY gives the y value of the perimeter of the circle where the meter is currently filled to
 double getDegrees()
          getDegrees specifies the current angle value of the meter in degrees

Constructor Detail

AngleMeter

public AngleMeter(int radius)
constructs a 180 degree (half circle) meter with specified radius

Parameters:
radius - the size of the semicircle's radius

AngleMeter

public AngleMeter(int radius,
                  int maxDegree)
constructs a semicircle meter with specified radius and maximum degree. WARNING: this is really intended to work with only multiples of 90 degrees.

Parameters:
radius - the size of the semicircle's radius
the - sweeping range of the meter. Intended to work in multiples of 90 degrees.
Method Detail

public void act()
act - allows AngleMeter to move in response to the left or right arrow keys being pressed.

act in class greenfoot.Actor

getAngle

public double getAngle()
getAngle specifies (in radians) the current angle value of the meter

Returns:
the angle value in radians of the meter.

getArcX

public int getArcX()
getArcX gives the x value of the perimeter of the circle where the meter is currently filled to

Returns:
the x location of the filled portion of the meter

getArcY

public int getArcY()
getArcY gives the y value of the perimeter of the circle where the meter is currently filled to

Returns:
the y location of the filled portion of the meter

getDegrees

public double getDegrees()
getDegrees specifies the current angle value of the meter in degrees
